summary: Female companion with unique fighting style
descriptionHtml:
Merina is an experienced and capable adventuress. Currently stopping over at the Inn in Solitude Merina is approachable. Merina has a unique fighting style and is pretty dangerous. Can also be married (if you dare)!
Now two versions available (v 0.1a latest). I have altered her costume because I discovered that 'saviours hide' is a skykids costume only. If you have this mod then you can use either - if you don't then try 0.1a

Frankly I have had a little trouble getting the 'follow me' bit to work.I f you have a problem let me know.
It would appear that some people cannot load this due to a requirement for "Skykids.esm". This was not intended and I apologise for any inconvenience - if you don't have skykids use v0.1a. If anyone else is getting this please tell me and I will withdraw until sorted.
[u][b]I cannot do anything if you don't tell me so please add constructive posts[/b][/u].

I really do need feedback on this companion 'cos she is designed for something much bigger and I need to get her right. Please comment.
author: Petray
